}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The ''TP-LINK'' logo and "2011500134 Rev:1.0" appears :to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
This device is using a [[Lantiq]] PSB 80190 (VRX268) SoC. :[[Lantiq]] is an offshoot of [[Infineon]]'s wire-based communication :division (sold in 2009 to ''Golden Gate Capital'', renamed [[Lantiq]]).
The default pattern for this device is probable '''TP-LINK_XXXXXX''' :(where '''XXXXXX''' is the last three octets of the wireless :interface MAC [uppercase letters]).
==Links of Interest== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/td-w8970 On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] :A0:F3:C1 OUI *[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8LZgam9ymB8 Unboxing and ''review'' on '''YouTube'''] :A0:F3:C1 OUI *[http://postimage.org/gallery/3lmrl2ns/ Internal photos] :[[Lantiq]] PSB 80190 V, V1.1 - VRX208 (AFE-LD) :2x [[Lantiq]] PEF 7071V, V1.4 - GbE PHYs
